sentences.en: ...carvings dating back to the Ming dynasty.
" The Capital Gazatte " , first published in the Han Dynasty ( 206 B.C. - 220 A . D . ), was the earliest newspaper in the world.
sentences.cn: 创始于中国汉代的《邸报 》 是世界上最早的报纸.

sentences.en: " The Classics on Tea " , written by Lu Yu of the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D . ) was the world's earliest treatise on tea leave production.
sentences.cn: 中国唐代陆羽写的《茶经》是世界上最早的茶叶制作专著.

sentences.en: Block - printed books did not appear until the Song Dynasty.

China boasts the world's earliest observatory, built in Nanking in 1385 in the Ming Dynasty ( 1368 A . D . - 1644 A . D . ), three centuries ahead of the Greenwich Observatory built in Britain in 1670.
sentences.cn: 中国建有世界上最早的气象台. 公元1385年,明朝在南京建立观象台, 比英国格林尼治观象台 ( 建于1670年 ) 早三个世纪.

sentences.en: One was Tang dynasty China, an empire stretching from the South China Sea to the borders of Persia, with ports open to foreign traders from far and wide.
sentences.cn: 一个是中国的唐王朝，这个帝国的疆域辽阔，最南到南海，最西到波斯边境，而且所有的港口均向来自世界各地的商人开放。

sentences.en: Some missionaries came from England in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 清朝时,从英国来了一些传教士.

sentences.en: The child could reel off many poems of the Tang Dynasty at the age of five.
sentences.cn: 这孩子五岁时就能把许多唐诗倒背如流.

sentences.en: The dynasty he founded ruled for 700 years.
sentences.cn: 他建立的那个王朝统治达700年.

sentences.en: The Giant Stone Buddha at Leshan Mountain in Sichuan Province of China, carved in the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D. ) , is 71 metres high , making it the largest statue of Buddha in the world.
sentences.cn: 中国四川的乐山大佛是世界上最大的佛像雕刻.它高达71米, 修建于唐代.

sentences.en: The Grand Canal began to build in the Sui Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 大运河是在隋朝开始修建的.

sentences.en: The Habsburg dynasty ruled in Austria from 1278 to 1918.
sentences.cn: 哈布斯堡王朝在1278至1918年间统治奥地利。

sentences.en: The imperialist powers forced the Qing Dynasty to sign a series of unequal treaties.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义列强迫使清王朝签订了一系列不平等条约.

sentences.en: The republic's new flag was emblazoned with the ancient symbol of the Greek Macedonian dynasty.
sentences.cn: 共和国新国旗上醒目地印着希腊马其顿王朝的古老标志。

sentences.en: The Seljuk dynasty of Syria was founded in 1094.
sentences.cn: 叙利亚的塞尔柱王朝始建于1094年。

sentences.en: The Tang Dynasty made Chang'an its capital.
The Yuan Dynasty established its capital in Dadu, now Beijing.
sentences.cn: 元代建都于大都, 即今之北京.

sentences.en: Written records show that acupuncture dates back to the Song Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 文字记载表明,宋朝就已经有了针灸.

words.tran_cn: 元首；统治者；王朝的君主

trans.tran_en: a family of kings or other rulers whose parents, grandparents etc have ruled the country for many years
